title: Cant play League anymore.
body: Wtf is this. ive been lagging so bad lately after the latest patch. I cant play, i played a rank after update and when i was in, i was 70 ms to 500 ms, my teammates thought i was trolling and still to this day i dont understand. my wifi been reseted, checked and i had really good wifi, i check everytime on a private game and still im lagging. once i just had a over 9000 ms like WTF. Rito pls fix or someone help me, cant even play league is getting me pissed.

replies.body: i have clicked and done all but when i try to find the lol log, it isnt shown or cant read it

If the higher ping is sudden then you could be experiencing packet loss which can be caused by an unstable connection to our server.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to really know for sure.  I suggesting going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help with this!  Let me know if you have any questions!
